info.name: eBook API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for the eBook microservices application.

This collection includes endpoints for:

- **Authentication**: User registration, login, logout, token refresh
    
- **Users**: User management (Admin only)
    
- **Documents**: Document CRUD operations
    
- **Pages**: Page management within documents
    
- **Categories**: Category management (Admin only)
    
- **Bookmarks**: User bookmark management
    

## Authentication

Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token authentication. Use the `/api/auth/login` endpoint to obtain an access token.

## Base URL

Set the `{{baseUrl}}` variable to your API gateway URL.

item.name: Auth

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns access token and user details on success.
Authenticate user with username/email and password. Returns access token and sets refresh token in HTTP-only cookie.
Refresh the access token using the refresh token stored in cookies. Requires the current access token in Authorization header.
Logout the current user and invalidate the refresh token.
Revoke all active tokens for the current user. Useful for security purposes.
Get the current authenticated user's information from the JWT token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and token management.

item.name: Users

request.description: Get all users with pagination and filters. Admin only.
Get a specific user by their ID. Admin only.

Create a new user. Admin only.

Role values:
- 0: User
- 1: Admin
Update an existing user. Admin only. All fields are optional.
Delete a user. Admin only.

item.description: User management endpoints. Requires Admin role.

item.name: Documents

request.description: Get all documents with pagination and filters.
Get a specific document by ID.
Get a document with full details including categories and pages.
Create a new document. The user ID is extracted from the JWT token.
Update an existing document. Only the owner or admin can update.
Soft delete a document. Only the owner or admin can delete.
Check if a document exists by ID.

item.description: Document management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting documents.

item.name: Pages

request.description: Get all pages with pagination and filters.
Get a specific page by ID.

item.name: Get Page by Document and Page Number

request.description: Get a specific page by document ID and page number.
Get a preview of a specific page.
Download the content of a specific page as a file.
Create a new page with file upload. Uses multipart/form-data.
Update an existing page. Uses multipart/form-data for file upload.
Delete a page. Only the document owner or admin can delete.

item.description: Page management endpoints for document pages.

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get all categories with pagination and filters. Admin only.
Get a specific category by ID. Admin only.
Create a new category. Admin only.
Update an existing category. Admin only.
Delete a category. Admin only.
Check if a category exists by ID. Admin only.

item.description: Category management endpoints. Requires Admin role.

item.name: Bookmarks

request.description: Get all bookmarks with pagination and filters. Admin endpoint.
Get bookmarked documents for a specific user with pagination and filters.
Add a new bookmark for a page.
Remove a bookmark.
Check if a page is bookmarked by a user.

item.description: Bookmark management endpoints for users to save and manage their bookmarked pages.
